The Burger King at Hill View 2 is nice and cozy, unlike other branches with a lot of customers. It‚Äôs a quiet and great place to relax.

Meat lovers can have their Whopper, animal lovers can have their juicy Plant-based Whopper. Burger King keeps everyone happy.

For Plant-Based Whopper, vegans can opt not to have the mayonnaise and religious Vegans/ vegetarians can opt not to have the onions and mayonnaise.

Got a takeaway and waited for 15min for my order when theres barely anyone in the restaurant at late hours 10.45pm on a Tuesday. After waiting for so long and went back to find our the meal I got, the medium onion fries was a pathetic 6 pieces only. Wow just wow. Bad bad bad service

Convenient parking within the mall located on the ground floor.
Spacious seating area with good safe distancing.
Clean and tidy, pretty comfortable with the environment.
Been there 2 times and foods served timely.
Some minor mistake but staff replaced it immediately without argument and with apology, that's was great.
Foods quality were nice too.
Will be there regularly.

This is turkey Bacon burger... Is bacon supposed to look like that? Actually it is the same across many BK outlets that i have tried.

Other BK burgers are better off.
